issue.title: [C++][Parquet] StreamReader.SkipColumns slow
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13079](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13079). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Using StreamReader.SkipColumns seems to slow down processing quite a lot instead of speeding it up. The more columns I skip the slower it gets.
